pullrequest.title: View Transparent and View Wireframe options to object menu

content.raw:
I noticed a problem when switching between wireframe/transparent modes and also View->Collisions. 

to reproduce: 

1. Insert dumpster

2. right click on dumpster and view as wireframe

3. From menu, View Collisions

4. Uncheck wireframe mode.

The dumpster model now has as solid orange color for its collisions
content.html:
I noticed a problem when switching between wireframe/transparent modes and also View->Collisions.

to reproduce:

  1. Insert dumpster

  2. right click on dumpster and view as wireframe

  3. From menu, View Collisions

  4. Uncheck wireframe mode.

The dumpster model now has as solid orange color for its collisions
